name: Hero Feed Co. (LD34)
description:
Built within 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34: Two Button Controls/Growing. You may notice Two Button Controls was the theme used.

Try and stay alive as long as you can in a monster's office break-room! I should also mention lunging into the enemy does nothing. My entire family was trying to kill the monsters and dying.

Controls//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Knight follows the mouse. Click to lunge forward. Right click to stop completely for more fancy maneuvers.
